exceptions.tactic: assert (forall y : Y, In (pi_dom x) y <-> exists (x0 : X) (i : In (pi_dom x) x0), pi_func x x0 i = y).

original: unfold premaximal. intros. assert (forall y : Y, In (pi_dom x) y <-> exists (x0 : X) (i : In (pi_dom x) x0), pi_func x x0 i = y). intro. split; intros. exists y. exists H0. reflexivity. elim H1; clear H1; intros. elim H1; clear H1; intros. rewrite <- (eq_part_inj_elt x0 x y x2 x3 H0 H2); auto with sets. assert (forall y : Y, In (pi_dom x) y \/ exists (x0 : X) (i : In (pi_dom x) x0), pi_func x x0 i = y). intro. elim (H0 y); intro. auto with sets. auto with sets. clear H0. assert (forall y : Y, In (pi_dom x) y). intro. elim (H1 y); auto with sets. intuition.
